POST http://localhost:3000/images?token=THE-TOKEN

bzw. als Query Param angeben: token - THE-TOKEN

Login required

memeId (essential): the memeId of the picture you want to handle

up, down (optional): Something put here changes the up or down votes of the image given in
memeId

comment (optional): A string you want to comment

Note: Only "up","down" OR "comment" will have an effect, even if they are all part of the body.
Priorities: "up" > "down" > "comment"

JSON-Body:
{
    "memeId": "someId",
    "comment":"this picture is great!",
    "up":"Anything here - acts like a flag - has higher priority than comment field"
}
